title: Arko Petroleum Falls 2.5% in Debut After $200 Million IPO
description: Arko Petroleum Corp., shares closed 2.5% below their IPO price, after the fuel wholesaler raised $200 million in a US initial public offering.
content: Arko Petroleum Corp., shares closed 2.5% below their IPO price, after the fuel wholesaler raised $200 million in a US initial public offering.
